headline: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Pushes Back On Fears Surrounding Big Tech's $700 Billion CapEx Surge: 'Compute Equals Revenues' In The New AI World
summary: On Wednesday, Nvidia Corp (NASDAQ:NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang said he remains "confident" that Big Tech's massive AI infrastructure spending will continue. AI CapEx Nears $700 Billion As Investors Question Durability During Nvidia's fourth-quarter earnings call, BofA Securities analyst Vivek Arya asked whether cloud providers can sustain nearly $700 billion in projected AI-driven capital expenditures, especially as cash flow tightens at some companies. headline: Amazon And OpenAI Forge US$50b AI Deal Centered On AWS Growth
summary: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) announced a $50b multi year investment and partnership with OpenAI to accelerate AI development. AWS will become the exclusive third party cloud provider for OpenAI's enterprise platform under the agreement. The deal includes joint work on new stateful AI developer environments and expanded cloud and AI services. Amazon.com, trading at around $209.97 per share, enters this new OpenAI partnership after a mixed period for the stock, with a 121.3% return over 3 years...

content.title: Amazon And OpenAI Forge US$50b AI Deal Centered On AWS Growth
content.summary: Amazon.com (NasdaqGS:AMZN) announced a $50b multi year investment and partnership with OpenAI to accelerate AI development. AWS will become the exclusive third party cloud provider for OpenAI's enterprise platform under the agreement. The deal includes joint work on new stateful AI developer environments and expanded cloud and AI services. Amazon.com, trading at around $209.97 per share, enters this new OpenAI partnership after a mixed period for the stock, with a 121.3% return over 3 years...

headline: OpenAI gives Pentagon AI model access after Anthropic dustup
summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman said late Friday that he’d reached an agreement with the department that reflects the firm’s principles on prohibiting “domestic mass surveillance and human responsibility for the use of force, including for autonomous weapon systems.”  The startup also built safeguards to ensure its models behave as they should as part of the deployment, Altman said in a post on the social media platform X.

content.title: OpenAI gives Pentagon AI model access after Anthropic dustup
content.summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman said late Friday that he’d reached an agreement with the department that reflects the firm’s principles on prohibiting “domestic mass surveillance and human responsibility for the use of force, including for autonomous weapon systems.”  The startup also built safeguards to ensure its models behave as they should as part of the deployment, Altman said in a post on the social media platform X.

headline: OpenAI Gives Pentagon AI Model Access After Anthropic Dustup
summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman said late Friday that he’d reached an agreement with the department that reflects the firm’s principles on prohibiting “domestic mass surveillance and human responsibility for the use of force, including for autonomous weapon systems.”  The startup also built safeguards to ensure its models behave as they should as part of the deployment, Altman said in a post on the social media platform X.

content.title: OpenAI Gives Pentagon AI Model Access After Anthropic Dustup

headline: Your spend as a ‘weapon’: Scott Galloway’s ‘Resist and Unsubscribe’ movement asks you to ditch Amazon, Apple, and Netflix to oppose Trump
summary: The NYU professor and podcast host is hoping to wipe out a quarter billion in market cap from 10 tech companies in his protest of Trump administration immigration policies.

content.title: Your spend as a ‘weapon’: Scott Galloway’s ‘Resist and Unsubscribe’ movement asks you to ditch Amazon, Apple, and Netflix to oppose Trump
content.summary: The NYU professor and podcast host is hoping to wipe out a quarter billion in market cap from 10 tech companies in his protest of Trump administration immigration policies.
